title: House for sale in Colombo 5
details:
* 3 Story house for sale in Chithra Lane, Colombo 5,

* Details as follows,

• G Floor : 4 bed rooms, 4 bathrooms, 1 living area, 1 dining area, kitchen, laundry area, store room, maids room and washroom.
• 1st floor : 1 room and living room area with common wash room
• 2nd floor : 1 room with attached bathroom
• 3rd floor : 1 room with washroom and open roof balcony.
• car parking for 5 vehicles and can park on the road too.
• back yard garden.
• driver's room with a wash room.
• Square feet : 4500+ (approximately)
* 21 perch land.
* Price- 210 million, selling for highest offer.

* Inspection only through Appointment! Brokers will not be entertained!
